tutorial: This problem has several general cases:  $$$x$$$ is even and $$$a > b$$$, then the answer is  repeated $$$\frac{x}{2}$$$ times, then $$$b - \frac{x}{2}$$$ ones and $$$a - \frac{x}{2}$$$ zeroes;  $$$x$$$ is even and $$$a \le b$$$, then the answer is  repeated $$$\frac{x}{2}$$$ times, then $$$a - \frac{x}{2}$$$ zeroes and $$$b - \frac{x}{2}$$$ ones;  $$$x$$$ is odd and $$$a > b$$$, then the answer is  repeated $$$\lfloor\frac{x}{2}\rfloor$$$ times, then $$$a - \lfloor\frac{x}{2}\rfloor$$$ zeroes and $$$b - \lfloor\frac{x}{2}\rfloor$$$ ones;  $$$x$$$ is odd and $$$a \le b$$$, then the answer is  repeated $$$\lfloor\frac{x}{2}\rfloor$$$ times, then $$$b - \lfloor\frac{x}{2}\rfloor$$$ ones and $$$a - \lfloor\frac{x}{2}\rfloor$$$ zeroes.
